course_title: Prevention of Mental and Behavioral Disorder
course_description: Students critically explore what prevention and promotion mean for mental and behavioral disorders and mental health across the life course and at different levels of the social ecological model (from the individual to policies). Students also evaluate different approaches for preventing mental and behavioral disorders, across the three stages of prevention, and for promoting mental health.
schedule_location: T 1pm-2:50pm in Grace Crum Rollins TBA
